data.about: A comedy with great taste.
data.name: Ratatouille
data.description:
Welcome to the official Disney•Pixar page for Pixar's Ratatouille.  Become a fan and check back often for images, quotes, and more updates from Remy, Linguini, Emile and the rest of the Ratatouille cast.  

This page is a place for Disney•Pixar fans. However, there are certain rules. Please be aware that Disney•Pixar does not accept or consider unsolicited idea submissions, and reserves the right to remove any posting or other material found to be off topic, inappropriate, or objectionable.

data.about: For active, real conversations. It’s free, instant and always connected. Your messages are delivered and read in seconds. You trust it. You control it.
data.name: BBM
data.description:
BBM is your private social network for active, real conversations.  It’s free to download and instant. BBM is always on so you’re always connected. And because messages on BBM are delivered and read within seconds it’s the closest thing to a live conversation.

You trust BBM, because you can see when your messages have been delivered and read. And your BBM conversations live on a private network you can count on. With BBM you choose your contacts and you choose how to share your information. Because BBM uses a PIN you don’t have to share your phone number or email.

BBM has more than 60 million monthly active customers, with more than 51 million people using BBM an average of 90 minutes per day. BBM customers collectively send and receive more than 10 billion messages each day, nearly twice as many messages per user per day as compared to other mobile messaging apps. Messages on BBM are read within seconds; indicating how truly engaged BBM customers are.

Download BBM for Android and iPhone at http://BBM.com

data.about: “If we work together, we’ll lower the cost of living for everyone…we’ll give the world an opportunity to see what it’s like to save and have a better life.”  - Sam Walton
data.name: Walmart
data.description:
Pharmacy Phone: 

Pharmacy Hours: Saturday: Call for pharmacy hours, Sunday: Call for pharmacy hours, Weekdays: Call for pharmacy hours


Services at this Location:


Guidelines for joining the discussion: http://corporate.walmart.com/social-media-guidelines

When Sam Walton opened the doors to the first Walmart in 1962, his goal was to save people money so they can live better. Sam was a firm believer in listening to what his customers had to say. That tradition continues today. But now, it doesn’t have to end when you leave the store. Through Facebook, we’re able to talk to you, find out what’s on your mind and let you know what we’re up to. It’s just another way we’re working to give the millions of families who shop at Walmart more of what they love—ways to save money and live better.

data.description:
The official Alfa Romeo page offers information, news and exclusive material to stay up-to-date with our world and to share exciting driving experiences.
This Facebook page welcomes all comments which respect the opinions of others. Comments which use violent, racist or vulgar tones, expressions or images will not be approved and may be deleted. Furthermore, any information, reports or complaints can be addressed to the Customer service number 00 800 2532 0000.
All our fans and car enthusiasts are always welcome.

data.about: Make A Difference mobilizes young leaders to ensure equitable outcomes for children in shelters across India.
data.name: Make A Difference
data.description:
Right now, close to 2000 Make A Difference volunteers work with about 5000 children in the Indian cities of Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Bhopal, Chandigarh, Chennai, Cochin, Coimbatore, Dehradun, Delhi, Guntur, Gwalior, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Lucknow, Mangalore, Mumbai, Mysore, Nagpur, Pune, Thiruvananthapuram, Vellore, Vijayawada and Visakhapatnam.

Do you want to help empower your community? Sign up! 
Visit www.makeadiff.in/join  or send IMAD <Name>,<Email ID>,<City> to 92200 92200.

data.about: Unified Soul Theory
data.name: Uplifting Content - Because The World Needs More Of It
data.description:
I started Uplifting Content because I was tired of seeing negative content everywhere. Around 90% of the news we see is negative which leads you to believe the world is a terrible place and everyone is awful. But that’s not true.

The world is the safest it’s ever been in the history of humanity and there are millions of people doing amazing things every day we just never hear about it!

Uplifting Content is here to remind you of the good in humanity. Show you the positive things that are happening in the world. Inspire, motivate and uplift you.

Here’s what we do:

We create and share uplifting content - we create our own and share content from incredible people and companies with positive messages.

We have a blog full of uplifting stories and articles offering advice.

We take submissions from people who need help with their cause and encourage our audience to support in whatever way they can, be it by donating their time, money, skills or resources.

And we give away free stuff… I basically want to be the next Oprah!

Ione :)
